title: Rigel X
subtitle: Locate Mysterious Contact
affiliationsText: Any affiliation (except [Borg]) may attempt this mission.

abilities.text: When six or more personnel begin a mission attempt here, you may draw two cards. If you do, your opponent may draw one extra dilemma and spend one extra in total cost on dilemmas.

lore: "...the last place he stopped before crashing on your planet."
